activities:
We do not collect any personal information other than the information submitted via online contact us or reseller form by our prospect that we use only for contacting our prospects who have shown interests in doing business with us. We use your personal information to provide you with better customer services and products. We do not pass your personal information submitted to us through online contact us to any third party and use it solely for the purpose of contacting you as one of our future prospects. 
The personal data collected will not be sold to anyone outside and will be solely used by E-SoftSys for a one-on-one contact with the registrants. You can let us know and we would be glad to take out your name from future follow ups. We maintain strict security systems designed to prevent unauthorized access to your personal information by anyone, including our staff. We do not store any sensitive information like credit card details etc. from our prospects we ask not to submit these details.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
